trans-unit.source: Represents an area within a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" /> control that represents a hyperlink within the control.
There are two ways to add a hyperlink to the text of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> control.
trans-unit.target: 有两种方法向的文本添加超链接<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection> class through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> to add multiple hyperlinks to the control's text.
trans-unit.target: 你可以访问<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>类通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.Links%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>将多个超链接添加到控件的文本。

trans-unit.source: If you only need to add a single hyperlink to the text of the control, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你只需将单个超链接添加到控件的文本，则可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>。

trans-unit.source: This property accepts a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> that defines the location of the hyperlink within the control's text.
trans-unit.target: 此属性接受<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>定义超链接控件的文本内的位置。

trans-unit.source: When a hyperlink is specified using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> property, the link area is then added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection> in the same manner as adding the link using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的超链接时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>属性，然后添加到链接区域<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>与添加链接时使用相同的方式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A> property specifies the number of characters within the text of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> to include in the link area.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A>属性指定的文本中的字符数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>要包含在链接区域中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A> property specifies the first character in the control text to include in the hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A>属性指定要包含在超链接中的控件文本内第一个字符。

trans-unit.source: If you want to determine whether a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> is empty, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.IsEmpty%2A> property instead of checking the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要确定是否可以使用特定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>是空的你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.IsEmpty%2A>而不是检查的值的值的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> class, with multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> sections defined, to display a label on a form.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>类，具有多个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>部分定义，以在窗体上显示标签。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A> properties to customize the look of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>.
trans-unit.target: 该示例演示了如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.AutoSize%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>可自定义的外观属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>。

trans-unit.source: The first <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> is specified using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 第一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>使用指定的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: Additional links are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 更多链接添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The example handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked> event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox> for other links.
trans-unit.target: 示例句柄<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked>通过启动 Web 浏览器的超链接，并显示的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>其他链接。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based starting location of the link area within the text of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" />.
The number of characters, after the starting character, to include in the link area.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea" /> class.
The object to compare to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea" />.
Determines whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea" /> is equal to the specified object.
<see langword="true" /> if the specified object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Returns the hash code for this instance.
A 32-bit signed integer that is the hash code for this instance.
Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea" /> is empty.
<see langword="true" /> if the specified start and length return an empty link area; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果指定的开始和长度返回空链接区域;否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine whether a valid link area has been specified in this object instead of evaluating the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此属性以确定是否已在此对象而不是估计的值指定的有效链接区域<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of characters in the link area.
The number of characters, including spaces, in the link area.
trans-unit.target: 字符，包括链接区域中的空格数。

trans-unit.source: To specify text from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> to display as a link, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A> property to the location in the text to start creating the link.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定从文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>若要显示的链接的形式，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A>到要开始创建链接的文本中的位置的属性。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A> property is set, set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A> property to the number of characters, including the character position specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A> property, that you want to make the link text.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A>设置属性，将其设置的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A>属性的字符，包括中指定的字符位置数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A>属性，你想要使此链接文本。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to make the first word of the text "The quick brown fox" a link, you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A> property to zero (0) and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A> property to three (3).
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你想要创建链接的文本"The quick brown fox"的第一个单词，则设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A>为零 (0) 的属性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A>属性设置为三 （3)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea" /> to compare.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea" /> to compare.
Returns a value indicating whether two instances of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea" /> class are equal.
<see langword="true" /> if two instances of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea" /> class are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea" /> to compare.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea" /> to compare.
Returns a value indicating whether two instances of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea" /> class are not equal.
<see langword="true" /> if two instances of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea" /> class are not equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Gets or sets the starting location of the link area within the text of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" />.
The location within the text of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" /> control where the link starts.
trans-unit.target: 文本中的位置<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" />该链接将启动其中的控件。

trans-unit.source: To specify text from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> to display as a link, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A> property to the location in the text to start creating the link.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定从文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>若要显示的链接的形式，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A>到要开始创建链接的文本中的位置的属性。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A> property is set, set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A> property to the number of characters, including the character position specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A> property, that you want to make the link text.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A>设置属性，将其设置的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A>属性的字符，包括中指定的字符位置数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A>属性，你想要使此链接文本。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to make the first word of the text "The quick brown fox" a link, you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A> property to zero (0) and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A> property to three (3).
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你想要创建链接的文本"The quick brown fox"的第一个单词，则设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Start%2A>为零 (0) 的属性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea.Length%2A>属性设置为三 （3)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the fully qualified type name of this instance.
A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing a fully qualified type name.
